createLiquidation
updateBasset
_validUniswapPath

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,address[] memory) view external returns (uint256[] memory)

nodes.name: triggerLiquidation
Liquidator
createLiquidation
updateBasset
_validUniswapPath

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,address[] memory) view external returns (uint256[] memory)

nodes.name: triggerLiquidation

params._bAsset: The asset to buy on Uniswap
params._curvePosition: Position of the bAsset in Curves BildPool
params._integration: The integration contract address from which to receive sellToken
params._minReturn: Minimum exact amount of bAsset to get for each (whole) sellToken unit
params._sellToken: Token harvested from the integration contract
params._trancheAmount: The amount of bAsset units to buy in each weekly tranche
params._uniswapPath: The Uniswap path as an array of addresses e.g. [COMP, WETH, DAI]

triggerLiquidation(address).details: Triggers a liquidation, flow (once per week):   - Sells $COMP for $USDC (or other) on Uniswap (up to trancheAmount)   - Sell USDC for mUSD on Curve   - Send to SavingsManager

params._integration: Integration for which to trigger liquidation

params._bAsset: New asset to buy on Uniswap
params._curvePosition: Position of the bAsset in Curves BildPool
params._minReturn: Minimum exact amount of bAsset to get for each (whole) sellToken unit
params._trancheAmount: The amount of bAsset units to buy in each weekly tranche
params._uniswapPath: The Uniswap path as an array of addresses e.g. [COMP, WETH, DAI]

userdoc.notice: The Liquidator allows rewards to be swapped for another token         and returned to a calling contract
